Package it.polimi.ingsw.Model

Class Board

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Model.Board
public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
The following class represents the game Board

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private static Box[][] board  
    private static Board singletonBoard  

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Modifier Constructor Description
    private Board()
    builds an instance of board, initially composed by 25 empty Box objects

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.util.List<Box> getBorderBoxes​(Box b)
    given
    Box getBox​(int riga, int col)
    given
    static Board getInstance()
    this method assigns a new instance of board to the singletonBoard
    static void newBoard()
    this method creates a new singletonBoard, it is going to be used when a new match is started in order to create an empty board

  • Field Details

    • board

      private static Box[][] board

    • singletonBoard

      private static Board singletonBoard

  • Constructor Details

    • Board

      private Board()
      builds an instance of board, initially composed by 25 empty Box objects

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static Board getInstance()
      this method assigns a new instance of board to the singletonBoard
      Returns:
      the singletonBoard, which now is surely the only board present in the match

    • getBox

      public Box getBox​(int riga, int col) throws java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException
      given
      Parameters:
      riga - row of the box
      col - column of the box
      Returns:
      the required box
      Throws:
      java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the two parameters given do not correspond to an existing box

    • getBorderBoxes

      public java.util.List<Box> getBorderBoxes​(Box b)
      given
      Parameters:
      b - , which is a box
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of boxes, that are the eight boxes surrounding the given box (obviously they can be less than eight if the given box is on the border of the board)

    • newBoard

      public static void newBoard()
      this method creates a new singletonBoard, it is going to be used when a new match is started in order to create an empty board
